abstract: Pakistan and India avert a potential military and diplomatic crisis after an Indian Army helicopter that strayed into Pakistan's airspace and was forced to land is allowed to return home.
snippet: The Pakistani military allowed an Indian Army helicopter to return home after it was intercepted in Pakistani airspace over Kashmir.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani military allowed an Indian Army helicopter to return home after it was intercepted in Pakistani airspace over Kashmir.

headline.main: India and Pakistan Sidestep a Crisis
headline.print_headline: India and Pakistan Sidestep a Crisis
headline.seo: India and Pakistan Avert Potential Crisis
